settings.text:
Meanwhile, in a distant realm beyond the stars, cosmic beings engaged in a celestial dance, their movements weaving patterns of light and darkness across the vast expanse of the universe. Galaxies collided and stars were born anew, each celestial event a testament to the unfathomable power that lurked within the cosmos.

Back on Earth, a solitary lighthouse stood sentinel on the edge of a rugged cliff, its beacon cutting through the darkness like a knife through silk. A lone keeper tended to the light, his weathered face illuminated by its warm glow as he gazed out across the churning sea, lost in contemplation of the mysteries that lay beyond the horizon.
